mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.name AS "name", a.sort AS "sort", a.href AS "href", a.is_show AS "isShow", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_menu a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu ( id, parent_id, name, sort, href, is_show, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{href}, #{isShow}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, href = #{href}, is_show = #{isShow}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
